DOC.brief_summary: Code Stroke system rapid identification , pre-notification transport acute ischemic stroke patient . The objective study define quality indicator compare treatment outcome hospital Code Stroke implement hospital without use Code Stroke ( control patient ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Efficacy Code Stroke Spain
DOC.detailed_description: In first step qualitative technique conduct define treatment quality indicator acute ischemic stroke patient . In second step prospective study conduct collect data 240 inpatient two group hospital . Two hospital apply Code Stroke ( N= 120 ) four hospital non-applying Code Stroke procedure ( N=120 ) . A consecutive sampling method conduct . Inclusion criterion : acute ischemic stroke patient treated hospital field study . The referral hospital could primary care , Emergency Unit hospital . Patients enroll inform consent . A Singer-blind- research method apply . Quality indicator define first phase apply comparison realize use ANOVA .
DOC.criteria: acute ischemic stroke inpatient Patients refuse participate
